items.value: Aims to protect quantum information from errors induced by quantum decoherence, environmental noise, gate and measurement imperfections.
Involves encoding quantum information in a way that errors can be detected and corrected without corrupting the information.
Information space to subspace of larger physical Hilbert space - Coding introduces redundancy.
Resources required to protect, like 3-qubit code.
Essential for large-scale practical computers when error rates are below a certain threshold.
